comments.body: This needs a guard, since `self.iam_role` will be unset if the option isn't specified.
It seemed more in line with the rest of the code to define the variable with a default value in `read_settings`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +556,560 @@            self.boto_fix_security_token_in_profile(connect_args)

        if self.iam_role:
            sts_conn = sts.connect_to_region(region, **connect_args)
            role = sts_conn.assume_role(self.iam_role, 'ansible_dynamic_inventory')

comments.body: use elif, its a minor optimization but will avoid overwriting errors. Same below.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +599,603 @@            if e.error_code == 'AuthFailure':
                error = self.get_auth_error_message()
            if e.error_code == "OptInRequired":
                error = "RDS hasn't been enabled for this account yet. " \
                    "You must either log in to the RDS service through the AWS console to enable it, " \
